text:
Use the e-prescription app now to record your decision to donate organs in the **digital organ donation register** – safely and easily.

There are currently 9,192 people in Germany waiting urgently for an organ – every decision counts and can save lives.

Make your decision today and make an important contribution to the future of many people! ❤️‍🩹

You can find the organ donation register in the “Settings” tab in this app.

**ePA compatibility** 
 🤝 Your prescriptions are now fully compatible with the electronic patient file. 
 
 **Improved** 
 ✨ Expired prescriptions are now archived.
